text: The love singer posted a photo of her sleepy little girl and wrote, "our little angel, carmella stanley costabile she arrived perfectly on january 17th everyday with her has been the best day. she is always smiling. she is pure joy & magic. we are so blessed & so in love!"
title: Christina Perri's Precious New Photo of Newborn Daughter Will Melt Your Heart
